doc_desc.title: GAD-7 (Generalized Anxiety Disorder Scale) - Portuguese Version

producers.name: Spitzer, R.L., Kroenke, K., Williams, J.B.W.

title_statement.title: GAD-7: Generalized Anxiety Disorder Scale - Portuguese
title_statement.subtitle: 7-item scale for generalized anxiety disorder screening in Portuguese-speaking populations

study_info.abstract: Portuguese translation of the GAD-7, a 7-item self-report questionnaire for screening and severity measurement of generalized anxiety disorder (GAD). Each item is rated on a 4-point Likert scale, measuring symptoms over the past two weeks. The Portuguese version has demonstrated excellent psychometric properties in Brazilian and Portuguese populations.

instrument_details.full_name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder Scale - Portuguese Version
instrument_details.response_scale: 4-point Likert (Nenhuma vez, Vários dias, Mais da metade dos dias, Quase todos os dias)
instrument_details.interpretation: 0-4: Minimal anxiety; 5-9: Mild anxiety; 10-14: Moderate anxiety; 15-21: Severe anxiety

psychometric_properties.validity: Good correlation with clinical GAD diagnosis in Portuguese populations
